Boxing

Muhammad Ali – the greatest books about The Greatest

‘The Murder of Sonny Liston: A Story of Fame, Heroin, Boxing and Las Vegas’ by Shaun Assael (2016)

‘The Lost Soul of Eamonn Magee’ by Paul D. Gibson (2018)
